name: Yōkai Shuffle! Alpha V. 0.2
description:
Yōkai Shuffle! is a traditional card game that capitalizes on being easy to pick up but difficult to master! This is an alpha just so we can kind of test the waters in terms of its development so please keep that in mind while playing.  

If you like what you see, please share it with friends and family! If you REALLY like what you see, then please consider supporting its funding by buying us a Kofi!

https://ko-fi.com/brandnewcarousel

All donations will go towards making  Yōkai Shuffle! the best game ever!

Thank you for playing, and we look forward to your feedback.
